Package group24.piazzapanic.game

Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • group24.piazzapanic.ui.StageAnimation
        • group24.piazzapanic.game.Customer
  • public class Customer
extends StageAnimation
    The customer class represents a customer in the game. It extends StageAnimation and has a Dish order. It also has a time limit for the order to be fulfilled.
